mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, EMAIL, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, REGISTRATION_DATE, ROLE_NAME FROM USERS u1 INNER JOIN ROLES r1 ON u1.ROLE_ID = r1.ROLE_ID
SELECT USER_ID, EMAIL, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, REGISTRATION_DATE, ROLE_NAME FROM USERS u1 INNER JOIN ROLES r1 ON u1.ROLE_ID = r1.ROLE_ID WHERE EMAIL = #{email}

SELECT USER_ID, EMAIL, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, REGISTRATION_DATE, ROLE_NAME FROM SHARED INNER JOIN USERS ON SHARED.ID_GRANTEE = USERS.USER_ID INNER JOIN ROLES ON USERS.ROLE_ID = ROLES.ROLE_ID WHERE ID_BOOK = #{bookId} AND ID_OWNER = (SELECT USER_ID FROM USERS WHERE EMAIL = #{userEmail})
